byline.contributor: Salman Masood contributed reporting from Islamabad.

abstract: Police in Karachi, Pakistan, are investigating fire that destroyed offices of Christian television station Gawahi TV; incident follows other recent attacks on religious minorities in Pakistan.
lead_paragraph: Employees of Gawahi TV said the fire at their office in Karachi was set deliberately, and that computers were destroyed or stolen and religious books were burned.

headline.main: Pakistani Police Investigate Fire at Christian TV Station
headline.print_headline: Christians Wary After Fire Hits a TV Station

snippet: Employees of Gawahi TV said the fire at their office in Karachi was set deliberately, and that computers were destroyed or stolen and religious books were burned.
